# AjaxSecurFlow
> Industrial-grade Proxy for Ajax Systems API with multi-tier subscription management.

## Core Files
- [backend/app/main.py]: API Entry point and Security Shield
- [backend/app/modules/ajax/]: Ajax Systems core integration
- [backend/app/modules/billing/]: Stripe and Voucher management
- [frontend/src/app/layout.tsx]: Root layout and UI configuration
- [docs/CONFIGURATION.md]: Full .env variable reference
- [docker/docker-compose.yml]: Infrastructure orchestration

## Key Concepts
- **Unified Identity**: Uses Ajax Systems as the primary Identity Provider (IdP).
- **Dual-Token Strategy**: Rotates Access (JWT) and Refresh tokens for local and upstream sessions.
- **Global Rate Limiting**: Centralized Redis-based counter to protect Ajax API limits (100 req/min).
- **Request Shield**: Proactive protection against vulnerability scanners and automated probes.
- **Hybrid SaaS**: Supports both automated Stripe payments and manual B2B Vouchers.
- **Modular Monolith**: Separates domain logic into vertical slices (Auth, Ajax, Billing, Security).

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Python 3.11+, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0 (Async), Celery, Redis.
- **Frontend**: Next.js 15+, React 19, TailwindCSS 4, Recharts.
- **Infra**: Docker, PostgreSQL 15, Redis.
